subject.normal: William Kwan/Elegance is out of the office.

headers.subject: William Kwan/Elegance is out of the office.

body.para: [ The following text is in the "iso-8859-1" character set. ] [ Your display is set for the "US-ASCII" character set. ] [ Some characters may be displayed incorrectly. ]

quote.quotepara: For info, I have just suspended his membership.

body.para: Maybe it would have been funnier to suspend him to the nearest tree. By the neck.
